meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of calcium magnesium carbonate.
meanings.sent1: The dolomite sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The geologist found dolomite in the cave.
meanings.sent3: The dolomite seemed to wink at the curious explorer.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as dolomite.
meanings.sent5: The dolomite's smooth surface felt cool to the touch.

meanings.definition: A type of limestone containing dolomite.
meanings.sent1: The builders used dolomite to construct the sturdy walls.
meanings.sent2: The dolomite limestone added strength to the structure.
meanings.sent3: The dolomite in the limestone made the walls extra tough.
meanings.sent4: The dolomite-infused limestone stood the test of time.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins were built with dolomite-rich limestone.

meanings.definition: A rock composed mainly of dolomite.
meanings.sent1: The dolomite rock formations towered over the landscape.
meanings.sent2: Hikers admired the beauty of the dolomite rock.
meanings.sent3: The dolomite rock looked like a giant's playground.
meanings.sent4: The dolomite rock stood out against the greenery.
meanings.sent5: The dolomite rock crumbled easily under pressure.
